definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Just a small stall outside the MRT station, very popular stall.
sentences.chinese: 只是小小檔口，就在地鐵站外面，難怪那麼多顧客。

sentences.english: During the Food Festival, each booth will promote special dishes or meals. Welcome to taste.
sentences.chinese: 美食節期間，檔口推出特價菜或優惠套餐，歡迎品嚐。

sentences.english: Can you come to my shop?
She'll return to China only at gunpoint.
sentences.chinese: 可是在這個檔口她還是要回到中國。

definition: plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
to close down (temporarily or permanently)/to go out of business
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
